basics.name: Samudra Palijama
basics.label: Mobile Engineer
basics.summary: Motivated, proactive, and hands-on developer with 4+ years experience developing and managing information systems for software development

work.summary: Developing and Maintaining Company's CRM Mobile Apps
highlights: Developing and Maintaining Mobile Apps
Designing and implementating new features for Mobile Apps
Research and implementing new technologies or stacks for future use
Developed and maintained company's CRM mobile applications using Ionic Framework and TypeScript, improving customer engagement rates
Designed and implemented new features for iOS and Android platforms, enhancing user retention through responsive UI/UX design
Researched and integrated Capacitor plugins to implement advanced device features for future mobile app functionality
Performed comprehensive manual testing with documented test cases, reducing post-release bugs
Deployed mobile applications to Google Play Store and Apple App Store, managing the entire submission and compliance process.
